event.title: Highest temperature in Miami on Aug 30, 2024?

markets.subtitle: 84° or below
markets.rules_primary: If the highest temperature recorded in Miami, FL for August 30, 2024 as reported by the National Weather Service's Daily Climate Report, is less than 85°, then the market resolves to Yes.
markets.rules_secondary:
Please be advised to check to see what temperatures have occurred previously in the day. While the market resolves based on the finalized report from the NWS, traders should use other data sources--including other preliminary NWS reporting--to inform their trades.
 
The Last Trading Time will be 11:59 PM ET on August 30, 2024 regardless of any data releases or events occurring. Expiration will occur on the sooner of the first 10:00 AM following the release of the data for August 30, 2024, or one week after August 30, 2024.
